title: Why does Meraki always copy panache
content:
So I was at IISC fashion event ELEGANTE and I was one of the organisers for the event and I saw both panache and meraki’s performances 
They had the same theme cyberpunk
After panache’s performance the club head came and talked about the theme and complimented the  designers and makeup artists. 
And after meraki’s performance the club head came and told the same exact thing word to word. How’s that even possible . Like geez be original.

Anyways I think panache had a way better performance choreography outfits everything included

comments.body: I saw panache practicing a lot for their performance during breaks and clg after hours, nice they got a good performance after all that :)

Nothing like that yall
They’re good people
Please don’t blame them for anything
